subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor was responsible for building the Amber Fort?
explanation_en: Raja Man Singh is the correct answer as he was the general of Mughal Emperor Jeet Singh and played a significant role in the construction of Amber Fort.
explanation_hi: राजा मन सिंह सरकार मुगोल राजा जीत सिंह के अधिकांत सहायता करते हैं और एम्बेर की बंदरगढ़ को बनाया गया है।
राजा मन सिंह के अधिकांत सहायता करते हैं और एम्बेर को बनाया गया है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
question_en: Which river is the largest river in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के सर्वाधिकांत भूमी कौन से बना गया है?
explanation_en: Indravati is a river located in Madhya Pradesh, while the largest river in Rajasthan is the Chambal.
